chapters.title: Chapter 5:  The Shadow in Shienar
chapters.info: Jaichim Carridin, p. 73 (65)—Commander of the Hand of the Light (the Questioners) in Tarabon. As a Questioner, he wears the golden sunburst of the Children of the Light with the red shepherd's crook of the Hand of the Light behind it. See also Bors.
